spatial_accuracy.notes: Major structural deviations were identified. A floor-to-ceiling wall was added between the kitchen/dining and living areas which does not exist in the floor plan. The central bathroom's footprint is significantly altered and missing the separated closet/toilet stall. Window and door counts do not match the source (e.g., extra door in the dining area, missing windows on the bottom wall).

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to UI constraints with no text or measurement lines. However, a significant hallucinated wall was added to create a room division where an open floor plan was specified. Correct floating model on a dark background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture style is clean and well-scaled. Sofa and coffee table are hallucinations not present in the 2D plan, but kitchen counters and bathroom fixtures align reasonably well.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect execution of the requested aesthetic. High-quality low-poly geometry with flat colors, soft ambient lighting, and an accurate isometric orthographic perspective.

detected_errors.description: Hallucinated full-height wall dividing the dining room from the living room.
The bathroom structure is simplified/distorted and missing the internal partition for the toilet stall (3' x 2' area).
Missing multiple windows as indicated by the orange markers on the bottom wall of the floor plan.
Hallucinated furniture (sofa, coffee table, and dining set) not present in the original blueprint.
Incorrect door placement for the dining area; the plan shows two windows, but the render includes an exit door.
